product_name: REI Sahara Shirt - Women's Plus Sizes
long_description: The women's REI Sahara Shirt in plus sizes is designed to keep you cool and comfortable when you're hiking in warm climates. Lightweight polyester fabric wicks moisture and stretches for comfort. Fabric also offers UPF 50+ protection; sun collar folds up to extend your coverage. When temperatures heat up, the sleeves can be rolled up shorter and held in place by button tabs located inside the sleeves. Shirt has 1 large mesh-lined vent at the back yoke; it also has a zippered, mesh-lined vent located on each side seam. Zip document pocket is hidden under the front placket; 2 shallow, mesh-lined chest pockets have secure rip-and-stick flap closures. Front of shirt also has a handy sunglasses loop by one of the chest pockets. Seam-free shoulder design prevents abrasion under pack straps. The women's REI Sahara Shirt in plus sizes has a relaxed fit that allows for comfort and movement.
